text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.timer_comba: Enable or disable the combat timer
Enable or disable the desk timer
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.timer_crate: Enable or disable the crate timer
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.timer_box.@: Enable or disable the box timer
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.timer_trash: Enable or disable the trash timer
Enable or disable the mail timer
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.fishing_ale: Enable receiving an alert when holding a rod under/at 3 dura
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.actionbar_s: Display a text over the actionbar when you are in a riot session, chocolate session, or in combat
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.contraband_: Color the tooltip red when the hovered item is contraband
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.cape_textur: Custom cape variation to display on your player
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.custom_cape: Enable showing the selected custom mlum cape on your player instead of the vanilla cape
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.escape_soun: Sound to play when "esc" or "escape" appear in chat
Show a style meter on the screen when fighting just like ULTRAKILL's style meter
text.autoconfig.mlumm.option.toasts.@Too: Disable timer/notification toasts from showing up and only send chat messages
text.autoconfig.mlumm.title: mlum mod configuration
